message: Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - com.qihoo.qsql.org.apache.calcite.sql.*.
WhitespaceAround: '{' is not preceded with whitespace.
'method def modifier' has incorrect indentation level 16, expected level should be one of the following: 8, 12.
'method def' child has incorrect indentation level 20, expected level should be one of the following: 12, 16.
'method def rcurly' has incorrect indentation level 16, expected level should be one of the following: 8, 12.
'object def rcurly' has incorrect indentation level 12, expected level should be one of the following: 4, 8.
